headline: Biden Heads for JD Vances Home Turf as Democrat Sits Out Event
author: Josh Wingrove
sentences: Ohios two current senators, Republican Rob Portman and Democrat Sherrod Brown, will join Biden on Friday, as will Greg Landsman, a Democratic city councilman in Cincinnati who is challenging Representative Steve Chabots re-election, an official familiar with the event said.
